## Function: `getDomainBiomass()`

### Purpose

Calculates mean biomass kg/cylinder (or $kg/177m^2$) at the domain level.

### Usage

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
getDomainBiomass()
```

### Output

## Function: `getStratumBiomass()`

### Purpose

Calculates mean biomass kg/cylinder (or $kg/177m^2$) at the stratum level.

### Usage

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false

```

### Output

### Purpose

#| echo: true
